headline: Here's Why Western Digital (WDC) Gained But Lagged the Market Today
summary: Western Digital (WDC) concluded the recent trading session at $44.75, signifying a +0.49% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Western Digital Names Storage Infrastructure Executive Ahmed Shihab as Chief Product Officer
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., March 17, 2025--Western Digital (Nasdaq: WDC) announced today that it has hired Ahmed Shihab as Chief Product Officer. Shihab, a seasoned expert in cloud storage needs and requirements, most recently served as Corporate Vice President of Azure Storage at Microsoft. In this role, he led the engineering and operations teams for Object and Block storage, driving the design and development of Microsoft's cloud storage solutions. As Western Digital’s new Chief Product Officer, Shiha
